reviews.review: eines der besten games

One of the more potentially filled candidates of games. But of course the developers ruined it again.
This game is barely playable right now. Theres endless hackers, toxic Killers/entitled survivors, broken game mechanics, stupid developer decisions. 

Contructive criticism or complaints get completely ignored by the developer/Moderators. The only reactions i got was from fellow players. And they agreed that this company is completely failing the game.

And just a little point of interest: The hackers in this game are having so much fun not getting banned, theyre programming literal Killerbots. Meaning they set up an AI that plays as the killer Using wallhacks and everything and nothing is being done about it.  

Save your 20 bucks and dont buy this heap of shit game.

Fuck this game and the MMR system. Every single time I play survivor, I get potatoes. Every single time I play killer, I get 1000+ hour SWF teams (survive with friends) that I cannot win or even kill one. I tried so hard to improve on this game to where i have watched more content on this game then actually played. I AM DONE WITH THIS GAME AND WATCHING CONTENT.

The game can be a lot of fun, but also very frustrating. It is full of egomaniacs who see only someone else's mistake, and never their own. In addition they are toxic and will do anything to ruin someone's day, selfish shit. As a survivor main, I often see survivors treating fair and correct killers like garbage. Why do you have to be toxic shit to someone who didn’t deserve it? When I see such a survivor, the first thing that comes to my mind is that he has no idea about the game and that he is a sad complex person, so that he went there to treat his complexes, you came to the wrong place reptile. On the other hand, I think the same thing when I see a killer who facecamps or tunnels survivor who didn't deserve it. I prefer to put someone on the 3rd hook knowing that I went the hard and honest way. All in all, I love DbD, but sometimes not because of the egomaniacs, of whom there are many in this game.

貞子コラボと聞いて三年ぶりに復帰。
操作方法もおぼつかない中最高ランクのサバイバーと何度もマッチングさせられ、0吊り全逃げゲート煽りとやられたい放題。やっとパークが揃ってきたと思いきや破滅は30秒で消滅、悶絶フックは目の前で破壊、サバイバーは足跡消滅にボロタイにライトと大暴れ。もうどっちがキラーかわかりません。
二度とインストールすることはないでしょう。DLCを買って損した。
新規で始めるのは本当にオススメしません。ゲーム性はとても面白いものだと感じますが、かなりの腕前になるまではサバイバー側はヌルゲー、キラー側はフラストレーションの塊のようなゲーム体験が待っています。

这款游戏刚出的时候我还在上学，只能看主播玩，那个时候就觉得这样的游戏很有意思。到后来终于可以买来自己玩，却已经遭到了封杀，人气在国内走下坡路了。
只能说可惜，开创性的1V4不平等对抗玩法，甚至后来各种模仿的游戏都没能到达这种高度。有针对国内玩家设计的特色屠夫，也有不断更新的经典鬼怪形象，在我看来都是诚意满满。
诚然这个游戏还是有很多缺陷，在很多地方都体现了小作坊的体量不足。但这个游戏最大的问题并不出于这些，而是出于人的身上。如果人屠双方都能多一些风度，少一些嘲讽，这个游戏的戾气并不会这么重，新手玩家的体验也不会那么差。但人屠阵营的分化，又使得这个游戏的恶意特别容易被传播下去，也是无可奈何的事情。
最后还是老生常谈，鬼片里不能有鬼，血不能是红色，犯罪不能脱罪，难道这些东西真的能影响一个成年人的心智吗？该完善的不应该是分级制度和审查流程吗？我不能理解。所以究竟是为了什么呢？我也不知道。

I really enjoy the game as a whole, but if I did not have friends who asked me to get this I would have refunded it when a first time killer was matched with a whole set of reds and golds...solo when killer or solo surv. 90% of gold and higher are some of the most toxic players I have ever seen in a gaming community, while people on comment and forums are some of the nicest. so I'm torn this game is a learning game to get skilled, but the match making is probably one of the single worst MMR systems I have ever seen. Still play with friends but otherwise really garbage experiences in Solo.

Esse jogo é dahorinha mas pqp injusto pra krl, tu pode perder a partida mesmo se jogar o melhor possível em qualquer um dos lados, vai passar raiva tentando melhorar e perdendo do mesmo jeito, boa sorte pra conseguir as conquistas de "assassino adepto" porque hoje em dia é muito difícil ganhar de assassino sem usar perks meta como intervenção corrompida, pop, barbecue and chili e outros. tirando o estresse constante que esse jogo proporciona, ele é muito bom. recomendo jogar com os amigos em call no discord porque vai te dar uma vantagem tão absurda que chega a ser ridículo. nota 7,8/10.

・徒歩キラーはキャンプ・トンネルをしなければまず勝てない環境。
　なお、キャンプ・トンネルをすると暴言を吐かれることもしばしば。

サバイバーをプレイすることは勧められるが、キラープレイは勧められない。

運営は、発電機の修理速度や弱キラーの調整をする気がないのであれば、せめてキラーは常時BP1.5倍とかにしてキラーの人口を増やすための取り組みをしてほしい。

飽きました。うんちです

Ill be honest game itself is great. 10/10 on the game, absolutely love playing it.

The community is horrid.

95% of the games you get will be like this.

As killer - Get ingame, by the time you get your first survivor hooked 3 generators are done. By the time you can kill one survivor (if you tunnel them) the gates are open, if your lucky you can get 2. Every game you are sure to be blinded multiply times doing close too any forced animation. And people will always be in pacts of 4.

Im not a bad killer but with how many people i get that are trying so hard to win that i once had 3 people blind me in turn for the full length of their extra length flashlights (with me trying to hurt them and turn away the entire time) so that the fourth person can open the gate and that the last person to escape tried to give me a pity kill, has made it so if i see a player has a flashlight at the start of the game i will leave the lobby, that if i dont get a hook by the time 2 gens are done i leave, because i know i wont get kill let alone win.

As survivor - TL;DR. You either always win with all four players alive, or you always get slaughtered, nothing in between.

The other 5% are either matches that are fun and challenging where everyone barely wins or barely loses.

This game is filled with too many people looking up the best build/strat to win, that it makes the game not fun. Its almost so bad that if i had the ability to ask for a refund, there have been times i might have done it. As all the killers i have bought are practically useless if i want to win or have fun, because if you dont run the "best killer + build" then chances of anything coming of the match besides frustration and sadness are 0.

Oh and fyi, if you do get the game and decide to get new killers, if you want a moderate chance of enjoying them, don't play them till you level them up too at least 20-40. Anything lower and unless you get people that suck at the game, chances of you doing much more then being a grandpa/ma yelling at them kids to get off your gens is assured.

I'm not much of an online gamer, but this game is very much worth the chance to give to anyone who isn't keen on playing online with others. It does take time and patience to get the hang of it, but it's definitely worth it.

This game is very amazing,and the price is not expensive.have another tematics:the killers,survivors,repair the machines and after open the metal door,to win the game.I recommend this game for play with friends and and be able to pass the time having fun

Like CS:GO, the game itself is great, but the community is awful.

Addendum, 3 months later: Obviously, I've put in an additional 400 hours and 30 or so dollars into this game since I first reviewed it, but my negative recommendation remains. The fact of the matter is that the overwhelming toxicity and entitlement that plagues most of the player base has deteriorated my mental health. It's the addictive gameplay loop and strategizing that keeps me coming back, not the players. The nice ones are too far and few between. I don't want anyone to deal with the plethora of bad ones, which is why I still don't recommend.
So Watermelon!

Gosta de filmes de terror? Já se perguntou por que certo personagem tomou aquela decisão burra que o levou à morte? Então esse jogo é a sua chance de mostrar que é conseguiria sobreviver se estivesse no lugar dele.

Nesse jogo você encontra rostos conhecidos de filmes como: 
- Halloween
- Pânico
- O Chamado
- A Hora do Pesadelo
- O Massacre da Serra Elétrica,
- Hellraiser
- Jogos Mortais
- Resident Evil
- Silent Hill
- Evil Dead (Uma Noite Alucinante)
Sem falar nos assassinos originais do jogo.

Aqui, além de jogar como sobrevivente, quando você estiver cansado de morrer também vai poder jogar como seu assassino preferido e estragar o dia da galera que está tentando fugir de você. Olha que legal!

Jogo já faz uns 2 anos e esse jogo não para de ser atualizado, sempre com novos sobreviventes e assassinos, cada um com suas habilidades. E é impressionante como eles conseguem licenças desses personagens de filmes e outros jogos.

Recomendo demais!

They INCREASED the grind instead of reducing it. 
I agree that having to use BBQ and WGLF in order to progress was stupid, but just throwing the BP boost out the window multiplied the grind.
Survivors now have a 10% survival rate, which is WAY too low.
I've found myself winning as killer way too constatly.
Playing survivor now is way too realistic because it feels like I'm being put into a torture chamber where the chances of surviving are near to 0 without being able to have any input on the final result. Unlike many horror games, being able to outsmart the killer seems to depend on the killer alone.
10.5/10 would get facecamped at 5 gens again

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (1vs4) torture simulator where one poor soul takes on the role of the Killer, and the other four "players" "play" as Survivors, likely successfully escaping the Killer, avoiding being caught and killed.

If you want to play killer, don't play
If you want to play survivor, uninstall
